sense.def:
Kadar se nekaj zgodi
after a particular date or event,
se zgodi pozneje od tistega datuma ali dogodka.

seg.quote: Soon after, Faraday began his research into electricity.
He was ill after eating the meal.

sense.def:
To go after someone
ali
to be after someone
pomeni tistega človeka zasledovati ali preganjati.

seg.quote: She ran after him into the courtyard.

sense.def:
Kadar je človek
after something,
poskuša tisto pridobiti.

seg.quote: Those youngsters are after my job.

sense.def:
Kadar je človek
named after someone,
ima enako osebno ime kot druga oseba.

Američani z besedo
after
povedo, koliko je ura. Na primer: kadar rečejo, da je
ten after six,
je ura šest in deset minut.

Kadar se nekaj dogaja
day after day
ali
year after year,
se dogaja vsak dan ali vsako leto.

cit.quote: dan za dnem, leto za letom

seg.quote: Some jokes go round school year after year.
